WorkItem.Description: I submitted a story an hour ago and when I look at the stories that I have submitted it does not appear.  Also the story does not appear in the upcoming stories list.  I also submitted a comment and when I look at my comments none show up.

Comments.Message: Not sure if this is an issue or not, but maybe the story is marked as spam for some reason or maybe it is not approved!!

@ingenutrix I just noticed that your story is submitted! and I posted a comment on it!! and I am able to view the comment on story and view story listed on my commented stories!
@ runxc1 I am not able to reproduce the issue
